definition: line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The businessmen shook hands after signing the contract.
sentences.chinese: 實業家們簽完合同之後相互握手。

sentences.english: He maintained that if the industrialists had their own bank, that constituted an important step towards their unity.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲聯合辦銀行就是實業家大團結的初步。

sentences.english: The famed modern-time industrialist Zhang Jian was born in Nantong.
sentences.chinese: 近代着名的實業家張謇就是南通人。

sentences.english: If you had been a high-powered banker or businessman during the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 若你在80年代曾是舉足輕重的銀行家或實業家。

sentences.english: She was determined that she would become a liberated businesswoman.
sentences.chinese: 她下定決心做一個思想解放的女實業家。

sentences.english: Industrialists in Coimbature have also expressed anger and dismay.
sentences.chinese: 哥印拜陀的實業家們也表示感到憤怒與錯愕。

sentences.english: The president made a presentation to the businesswoman of the year.
sentences.chinese: 總統爲本年度最成功的女實業家頒發了獎品。

sentences.english: There isn’t a single entrepreneur in my family.
sentences.chinese: 我的祖上沒有一個實業家。

sentences.english: Tin Ka-ping is one of Hong Kong's best-known industrialists and philanthropists.
sentences.chinese: 田家炳是香港最有名的實業家和慈善家之一。

definition: Chen Yun (1905-1995), communist leader and economist
to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
